name: vault-app
description: Offline Vault App with Google Drive JSON sync

scripts.start: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --mode development" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --mode development" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron-dev-debug: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --mode development" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development OPEN_DEVTOOLS=true electron ."
scripts.package-mac: npm run build && npx electron-packager . VaultApp --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --overwrite --out=builds --prune=true --ignore="/(builds|releases|src|__tests__|scripts|webpack\.config\.js|tsconfig\.json|babel\.config\.json|\.git|\.gitignore|README\.md|RELEASE_GUIDE\.md|.*\.md|public/Images)/"
scripts.package-win: npm run build && npx electron-packager . VaultApp --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite --out=builds --prune=true --ignore="/(builds|releases|src|__tests__|scripts|webpack\.config\.js|tsconfig\.json|babel\.config\.json|\.git|\.gitignore|README\.md|RELEASE_GUIDE\.md|.*\.md|public/Images)/"
scripts.package-all-platforms: npm run package-mac && npm run package-win
scripts.release: npm run package-all-platforms && npm run create-release

author: Regnitiel
